segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and things are definitely not right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has absolutely no idea the water is pouring over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a small waterfall cascading down her cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water spilling is truly shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause a lot of damage if she doesn't notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wood on those cabinet doors will be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the soft splash as it spreads across the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange scene, this calm amidst such a clear impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish I could tap her on the shoulder.
segments.speaker: PAR
